name: odbc_gettypeinfo
purpose: Retrieves information about data types supported by the data source

return.description:
Returns an ODBC result identifier or
   FALSE on failure.The result set has the following columns:
   
    TYPE_NAME
    DATA_TYPE
    PRECISION
    LITERAL_PREFIX
    LITERAL_SUFFIX
    CREATE_PARAMS
    NULLABLE
    CASE_SENSITIVE
    SEARCHABLE
    UNSIGNED_ATTRIBUTE
    MONEY
    AUTO_INCREMENT
    LOCAL_TYPE_NAME
    MINIMUM_SCALE
    MAXIMUM_SCALEThe result set is ordered by DATA_TYPE and TYPE_NAME.
